text: Kevin L. Bryant (born February 19, 1967) is an American politician, pharmacist, and businessman. He is a member of the Republican Party. He was the 92nd Lieutenant Governor of South Carolina from January 25, 2017 to January 9, 2019. He was in the South Carolina Senate from 2005 to 2017. He lost the Republican gubernatorial nomination in 2018 to Governor Henry McMaster. Bryant is a Creationist who believes the entire Universe was created in 6 days about 6,000 years ago. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Lieutenant Governors of South Carolina Category:Living people Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Kevin L. Bryant
